alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washington and northwestern Bennington Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem, Granville, Hartford, Dorset, Greenwich, Porter, Rupert, Argyle, Cossayuna, Middle Granville, Braymer School, Battenville, Center Falls, Goose Island, East Hebron, South Granville, Rexleigh, Tiplady, Raceville and Middle Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
